line.originaltext: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite size pieces
1 cup lemonade
2 tablespoons olive oil
1 tablespoon lime juice
1 1/2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
1/2 teaspoon onion powder
1 bay leaf
1 (12 ounce) package corn tortillas
1 head lettuce, shredded
2 large tomatoes, chopped
1 (8 ounce) package shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 (8 ounce) jar salsa
1 (8 ounce) container sour cream
In a large skillet over medium heat, combine chicken, lemonade, olive oil, lime juice, and Worcestershire sauce.
In a large skillet over medium heat, combine chicken, lemonade, olive oil, lime juice, and Worcestershire sauce.
In a large skillet over medium heat, combine chicken, lemonade, olive oil, lime juice, and Worcestershire sauce.
line.annotation: combine({ing69, ing70, ing71, ing72, ing73}, ing83, "chicken mix", "")

line.originaltext: In a large skillet over medium heat, combine chicken, lemonade, olive oil, lime juice, and Worcestershire sauce.
Season with garlic powder, onion powder, and bay leaf.
line.annotation: combine({ing74, ing75, ing76, ing84}, ing85, "seasoned mix", "")

line.originaltext: Simmer until chicken is no longer pink, and juices run clear, 15 to 20 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing85, t8, ing86, "cooked mix", "simmer until chicken is no longer pink, and juices run clear, 15 to 20 minutes")

line.originaltext: Simmer until chicken is no longer pink, and juices run clear, 15 to 20 minutes.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing86,"chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear")

line.originaltext: Meanwhile, warm the tortillas in the oven or microwave until soft.
Meanwhile, warm the tortillas in the oven or microwave until soft.
line.annotation: cook(ing77, t9, ing87, "warmed tortillas", "warm tortillas until soft")

line.originaltext: Meanwhile, warm the tortillas in the oven or microwave until soft.
When chicken is fully cooked, transfer to serving bowl.
When chicken is fully cooked, transfer to serving bowl.
Place lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, and sour cream in serving dishes.
Place lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, and sour cream in serving dishes.
Place lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, and sour cream in serving dishes.
Place lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, and sour cream in serving dishes.
Place lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, and sour cream in serving dishes.
Place lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, and sour cream in serving dishes.
Each person can create their own wrap, using their preferred ingredients.
line.annotation: combine({ing78, ing79, ing80, ing81, ing82, ing86, ing87}, ing88, "chicken tortillas", "each person can create their own wrap, using their preferred ingredients")
